entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: 0.2°C

Humidity: 59 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
